vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Λώτ, ὁ (Heb. לוֹט), indecl.,
Lot (Gen.11:27, al.): Luk.17:28-29, 32, 2Pe.2:7.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.11.27;
son of: Haran (H2039);
brother of: Milcah (H4435) and Iscah (H3252);
father of: daughter1_of_Lot (H3876H), daughter2_of_Lot (H3876I), Moab (H4124H), Ben-ammi (H1151)
§ Lot, (Proper name), indeclinable, Lk. 17:28, 29, 32; 2Pet. 2:7*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
羅得 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "面紗或遮布"
哈蘭之子, 亞伯拉罕的姪子
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
罗得 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "面纱或遮布"
哈兰之子, 亚伯拉罕的侄子
